body_html:
The gradle file has been updated to use the 0.0.0-nightly, as per-suggested by andrehentz, in this commit. It's worked fine for me locally, whereas the 0.1.7 AAR ran into the issue you all ran into. Note that as the commit suggests, this solution is better, but not perfect (may need to pull new demo code sometimes).

Closing this issue for now. Let us know if you continue to run into issues!

body:
The gradle file has been updated to use the 0.0.0-nightly, as per-suggested by andrehentz, in this [commit](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/b84506ec8961306100ee67bd06ed8d2b59f4b1c8). It's worked fine for me locally, whereas the 0.1.7 AAR ran into the issue you all ran into. Note that as the commit suggests, this solution is better, but not perfect (may need to pull new demo code sometimes).

Closing this issue for now. Let us know if you continue to run into issues!
